name: Harbour Heist
description:
This game takes place in the turn of the century and is about a young thief who needs to steal to afford medicine.  The child enters a large boat where they have to go through several cabins to find valuables worth different amount of money (based on what things costed in Sweden around 1900).  The child has to be quick since there's a time limit to when people will come back to their cabins!

Credits:

Coding: Jonas

Art: Morgis, Stedden and Johan Handin

UI and Level Design: Emil

Sound and Music: Malin and bollkalle
